description.lang: ZDS-210 enabled product allows users to remotely control lighting, home appliance, and make home control easy with low installation and maintenance costs. You may begin with a few Z-Wave enabled devices as well as some of our products to build up a complete home automation system.The ZDS-210 is a Z-Wave enabled device and is fully compatible with any Z-Wave Plus enabled network. It can be configured as either a DIMMER or a SWITCH device. It allows remote Dimming or ON/OFF control of specified lamps. Each module is designed to act as a repeater, which will re-transmit a radio frequency (RF) signal by routing the signal around obstacles and radio dead spots to ensure that the signal is received at its intended destination.ZDS-210 is a security enabled Z-Wave plus device. A security Enabled Z-Wave Plus Controller must be used in order to fully utilize the product.

Association group_1 (max. 1 node) is default to associate with the primary controller (Gateway/Hub/Controller) for ZDS-210 Status change report, refer to below for report details:ZDS-210 will trigger AUTO report function if the Dimmer or Switch status had been changed.Device Reset Locally Notification(Only report when the ZDS-210 Dimming Switch Module has been triggered the RESET TO DEFAULT)

Dimmer mode: After receiving a dimming command from a local switch or gateway (e.g. 50%), the ZDS-210 will automatically send out a related basic set command (e.g. 50%) to its associated group.Switch mode: After receiving a basic set command from a local switch or gateway, On (0xFF) or Off (0x00), the ZDS-210 will automatically send out a related basic set command, On (0xFF) or Off (0x00) to its associated group.(Max. 4 node ID's can be assigned to this association group)
Double Click Option (Set to max. brightness)0 (0x00) - Double click function disabled1 (0x01) - Double click function enabled

name.lang: Time to move the Dimmer from 0% to max. dimming values

description.lang: Time to move the Dimmer from 0% to max. dimming values.(The ZDS-210 will implement the dimming duration if received this parameter value from controller/gateway. Otherwise, the ZDS-210 will implement the local parameter value)

Minimum Dimmer level control1 (0x01) to 98 (0x62) %[Below are the recommended parameters for different loads.AC Motors:Parameter no. 18 max. = 99% Parameter no. 19 min. >= 60%Fluorescent Lamps, Fluorescent Tubes, Non-dimmable LEDs:Parameter no. 18 max. = 99% Parameter no. 19 min. = 98%Notes: 1) The maximum level must not be lower than the minimum level. 2) Parameter no. 17 MUST be set to 0]

name.lang: Switch returns to the last position saved before power failure

description.lang: 0 (0x00) - Switch does not save the state after power failure, device returns to u0022offu0022 position1 (0x01) - Switch saves its state before power failure
